data.text:
James Cameron is an acclaimed movie director that who's movies have made over $6.3 billion dollars worldwide, with $1.9 billions coming just from the United States.

He has directed two of the highest grossing movies of all time in Titanic and Avatar, as well as many other iconic movies such as The Terminator, Aliens, Rambo II, The Abyss, Terminator 2, True Lies and several more.

Cameron was born in Ontario, Canada on 1954, and at age 23 he quitted his job and decided he was going to enter the film industry after seeing the first Star Wars movie.

James Cameron net worth

James Cameron is a movie director and producer that has an estimated net worth of $700 million dollars, according to specialized website Celebrity Net Worth.

James Cameron wanted to do Titanic so bad, that when the movie went over budget, he decided to forfeit his $8 million dollar salary and agreed he would receive compensation based on the movie's back end points, which translated to a $650 million payday when Titanic went on to become the highest-grossing movie of all time at that moment.

He then took the same road while directing Avatar, earning around $350 million till this day, after it took Titanic's place as the highest grossing movie ever.

James Cameron released the new "Avatar: The Way of Water" trailer

James Cameron is excited about his upcoming movie: "Avatar: The Way of Water" and he has expressed that the technology breakthroughs will allow viewers to enjoy the full experience of the movie.

The latest trailer for the movie was released this week.
